profile.name: ISO 19005-1:2005 - 6.9 Interactive Forms - Need Appearances
profile.description: The NeedAppearances flag of the interactive form dictionary shall either not be present or shall be false
profile.creator: veraPDF Consortium

rule.description: The NeedAppearances flag of the interactive form dictionary shall either not be present or shall be false

error.message: The interactive form dictionary contains the NeedAppearances flag with value true
